name: v1_motorcycles
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool motorcycles_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Detailed technical specifications on tens of thousands of motorcycle models. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/motorcycles.
API description: API Ninjas Motorcycles API endpoint. Returns up to 30 motorcycle results matching the input name parameters. For searches that yield > 30 results, please use the offset parameter.

Either **make** or **model** parameter must be set.

model.description: name of motorcycle model. Supports partial matching (e.g. Ninja will match Ninja 650).

offset.description: Number of results to offset for pagination. Default is None.

make.description: name of manufacturer/brand. Supports partial matching (e.g. Harley will match Harley-Davidson).

year.description: release year of motorcycle model. Must be in the form of YYYY (e.g. 2022).
